name: unvaccinated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a person or animal is unvaccinated, they have not been given a vaccine (= a substance that is put into your body to protect you from a disease): There was an outbreak of measles among unvaccinated children. Unvaccinated animals can present a severe health risk to humans. Related word
vaccinate
More examplesFewer examplesMost of the people who died were either unvaccinated or over 70 years of age.The illness has been reported in both vaccinated and unvaccinated children.All of the unvaccinated mice died within two days of becoming infected.

the unvaccinated
people or animals who have not been vaccinated (= have not been given a vaccine to protect them from a disease): Vaccinating the healthy protects the unvaccinated. The unvaccinated include babies under a year old, who are still too young to be given the vaccine.
More examplesFewer examplesThe unvaccinated are mainly children of parents who are worried about potentially harmful side effects of immunization.Doctors are worried even if the numbers of the unvaccinated are still relatively small.Governments promote vaccination in order to create "herd immunity" - from which the unvaccinated will also benefit.
